extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Firmware Update
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the upcoming firmware update to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that strong passwords are used for device access to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused TCP/UDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable any unused TCP/UDP ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Direct Internet Connection
extracted_playbook.description: Do not directly connect the device to the internet to minimize exposure to threats.

cve_id: Firmware Vulnerability in Various Controllers and Panels
affected_products: 762-5xxx, Series Touch Panel 600 Advanced Line, FW16 < FW22
762-6xxx, Series Touch Panel 600 Marine Line, FW16 < FW22
762-4xxx, Series Touch Panel 600 Standard Line, FW16 < FW22
